feed.title: Category: TV Shows | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Breaking Pointe - Season 1 - Episode 2 - Second Cast is First Place For Losers
entry.content: There were some fun moments here. I loved when they were talking about what they ate. I thought the "rivalry" between Beckanne and Allison seemed edited out of proportion, especially Beckanne's dinner with the girls.

entry.title: Breaking Pointe - Season 1 - Episode 2 - Which Life Do I Want to Lead?
entry.content: This seemed like it had a really fake drama and that the dancers wouldn't actually leave the ballet.

entry.title: Breaking Pointe - Season 1 - Episode 1 - Survival of the Fittest
entry.content: I've never watched a reality TV show, but I love ballet and Ballet West, so we decided to watch this. The first episode was fun to see people that we recognize from the ballets.

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Christmas Special
entry.content: This was an amazing episode. I love that it was so happy and so many wonderful things happened. I feel like Daisy and Mary really deserve their happiness. I like the way things happened with each of them. The grandma was in ripe form this episode too. Classic.

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 2 - Episode 8 - Episode Eight
entry.content: This was a pretty epic ending. There's always more tragedy after a few good things in this show.
